```{r}
#Reading in dataset into object 
df = airquality

#Find all rows where there are missing values 
findNa = function(df) {
  
  ln = nrow(df)
  
  vec = c()

  
    for (x in 1:ln) {
      if (anyNA(df[x,])) {
      vec = c(vec,x)}
    }
  
  return(vec)
  
}




```
